item.title: From PEM to OpenSSH for usage in ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
item.description: Say you have a private key in PEM format, and you want to use that key for SSH into another server, by adding an entry to your ~/.ssh/authorized_keys file with the public key of such PEM file. The following command will parse your PEM file and output the required RSA format used in authorized_keys: ssh-keygen -y -f path/to/file.pem This will output a ssh-rsa AAAAâ€¦ string that is safe to append to your ~/.
